chart_description: The `netdata.workers.mltrain.time` chart shows the percentage of time that workers of Netdata server are busy with machine learning training. This chart helps identify the performance of ML training over time. A value of 100% indicates that all the workers are busy, with no available resources for further training.

dimension_descriptions.average: The average percentage of workers that are busy with ML training over the monitored period.
dimension_descriptions.max: The highest percentage of workers that were busy with ML training at any moment over the monitored period.
dimension_descriptions.min: The lowest percentage of workers that were busy with ML training at any moment over the monitored period.
